### Installation of the package

You can install LineaGT from GitHub using `devtools`
```{r setup}
devtools::install_github("caravagnalab/lineaGT")
```

Load the package.
```{r}
library(lineaGT)
```

### Helper function to install the Python dependencies
A `conda` environment can be configured running the `configure_environment()` function.
```{r}
configure_environment()
```

The function will first check if a Anaconda or Miniconda installation is available, otherwise it will prompt a Miniconda installation.
Then, if the `conda` environment `lineagt-env` is not availabe, it will create it and the required `Python` dependecies will be installed in the environment.
